name: POSIOS
tag_list: pos, restaurant, mobile, ipad, iphone, cash-register, belgium, food, ordering
overview:
POSIOS offers a cloud-based mobile Point of sales ecosystem for restaurant and bars, providing solutions to enhance their revenue, productivity and visibility.

Restaurant and bar owners need a broad range of solutions to manage and promote their businesses, such as a , cash register, website, menu card and marketing tools. Currently, owners have different suppliers and maintaining everything is a hassle and expensive. POSIOS will bundle these separate solutions in a single integrated cloud-based service, which will lower the expenses and improve maintainability and usability.

Fully integrated ecosystem using consumer devices

The rise and adoption of new technologies like smartphones, tablets and the wide availability of broadband internet creates an opportunity for POSIOS to develop the core of the ecosystem: Restaurant Butler which is a innovative cash register that works on the iPAD and is available on the App store.

Beside the cash register POSIOS is currently developing new and innovative solutions for restaurant and bars, which will change how restaurant owners and their customer interact.
